content.prompt: In the design of the Vietnam Veterans Memorial, Maya Lin drew connections between the Vietnam War and other events in United States history by

choices.label: including the names of soldiers who died in the First and Second World Wars
positioning the memorial at an equal distance from the United States Capitol building and the White House
orienting the walls so that they point to the Washington Monument and the Lincoln Memorial
situating the memorial at the exact center of the National Mall
